Hydras:

"Yes... "replied the male"But some info and information are 
activated only with my voice"


--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, EmprzAnastazia@a... wrote:
> In a message dated 2/16/03 11:06:04 PM Central Standard Time, 
> airly2002@h... writes:
> 
> 
> > The male arrived to a room and in midle of it was a cicular 
table. 
> > Hydras pressed a button and a 3d Map appeared. en  in this map 
the 
> > bases of every faction were marked with faction's logo
> 
> She had followed him into that room.
> 
> Her optics glancing about, then at the circular table he had 
walked up to. 
> Waiting patiently. 
> 
> As the map pulled up, her optics seemed to glow. As she stepped 
forward 
> closer, a wicked smirk upon her feline face. Her optics dancing 
about, as she 
> studied every square inch of the map & where the bases were. Such 
invaluable 
> information. Silently, she laughed, commending herself. He said 
that she was 
> cunning. Indeed.. one living for so long would have to be.
> 
> "I thank you for such an insurmountable wealth of information. I'm 
sure... it 
> will come in handy." & indeed ... it will. Already she started to 
plot, how 
> would she terminate Empath. True, her time was at an end. Not 
abiding by the 
> oath that was taken as a Decepticon. Poor Empath. Had she not 
learned that 
> lesson when it happened to Octane so many years ago? Obviously 
not. 
> 
> Silently padding around the table, her optics upon the map as she 
studied 
> everything. 
> 
> "I assume the map & the computer systems are voice activated?"
